HomeScene_FieldChangeDialog_Doctor_3:
Looks like you and this Snorlax
didn’t do any sleep research
during your time together.
HomeScene_FieldChangeDialog_Doctor_4:
Now it’s time to pick this week’s
research site, so we’ll have to
say bye-bye here.
Home_AutoPickup_Popup_Desc:
Your Pokémon helped provide Snorlax
with some snacks while you were away.
It’s grown even stronger!
Home_NoMoreSleepStartPopup_Message:
You can track up to two sessions of
sleep per day. You’ve hit today’s limit.
Home_NoMoreSleepStartPopup_UnixtimeDupli:
You can’t start tracking sleep right
now because your device’s current
time overlaps with the time of a
sleep session you previously tracked.
For details, please consult the FAQ.
HomeScene_FieldChangeDialog_Text:
You’ll spend seven days—from Monday
through Sunday—raising a Snorlax each
week by building up its Strength as you
carry out sleep research. But when the
week is over, it will be time to say
goodbye to that Snorlax, move to a new
research site, and find a new Snorlax
to help with your studies.
HomeScene_FieldChangeDialog_Doctor_1:
Nice work this week! Looks like
you’re getting more and more
used to doing research here.
HomeScene_FieldChangeDialog_Doctor_2:
Now, alas, it’s time to say
goodbye to this Snorlax! We’ve
got to pick next week’s site.
HomeScene_FieldChangeDialog_Player_1:
Take care, Snorlax! Thanks for a
great week of snoozy studies!
HomeGPPController_Text_2:
If you unpair your Pokémon GO Plus +,
any sleep data you haven’t synced
with Pokémon Sleep will be lost.
Are you sure you want to unpair it?
HomeSceneOverflowController_Text_2:
Your bag’s ingredients pocket is full.

HomeSceneOverflowController_Text_6:

You can still track your sleep today,
but you can’t do any more sleep
research. The most sleep you can
count toward your research is
8 hours and 30 minutes per day.

HomeScene_Holiday_BannerPopup_Text_1:
An event on �퍩￿Greengrass Isle��＀ will last from
4:00 a.m. on Monday, December 18:
�퍩￿Holiday 2023 — Double Dream Shard Research��＀!
Holiday 2023 — Double Dream Shard Research is
a week-long event during which you can get
�퍩￿double the Dream Shards��＀ through sleep
research, and you may even meet a Shiny
Pokémon!
There will also be an event-limited function
called �퍩￿Candy Boost��＀ that will double the
effectiveness of candies!
The main skill �퍩￿Dream Shard Magnet S will be
twice as effective��＀ as well during the event,
so this is an opportunity to really raise up your
Pokémon!
HomeScene_Holiday_BannerPopup_Text_2:
In addition, the Snorlax on Greengrass Isle
during the event week will have �퍩￿Rawst Berries��＀
(Ice type) set as one of its favorite Berries.
And for this event as well, you’ll be able to
meet Pokémon of �퍩￿different sleep types��＀
regardless of your own!
Through�퍩￿ limited-time missions��＀ during the
event, you can get great rewards such as up to
�퍩￿a total of 60 Pikachu candies��＀.
Also, researchers who conduct sleep research
on the final day of the event will get a gift of
�퍩￿1,225 bonus sleep points��＀!
On top of that, you’ll have a higher likelihood
of meeting �퍩￿Pokémon such as Delibird, Snover,
and Abomasnow��＀, as well as �퍩￿a Pikachu wearing a
red hat��＀!
We hope you’re looking forward to the event!
HomeScene_Holiday_BannerPopup_Text_3:
• How to Progress in the Event
Participating in the event is easy!
Simply tap the “Sleep” button on �퍩￿Greengrass
Isle��＀ before going to sleep during the event
period to track your sleep.
A variety of event-related effects will be
triggered during your sleep research.
Note: Tracking sleep on any map other than
Greengrass Isle will not trigger the event
bonuses. The effects described below will apply
during the event period.

HomeScene_EeveeWeek_BannerPopup_Text_1:
The �糿＇Eevee Week 2023��＀ event lasts from
4:00 a.m. on Monday, November 20!
HomeScene_EeveeWeek_BannerPopup_Text_2:
Eevee Week 2023 is a week-long event to
celebrate Eevee Day (November 21), during
which �糿＇Eevee and its Evolutions are more likely
to gather to sleep��＀!
You’ll be able to encounter Pokémon of
�糿＇different sleep types��＀ regardless of your own,
and Eevee and its Evolutions will be �糿＇more likely
to appear��＀.
You might even meet a Shiny Eevee!
HomeScene_EeveeWeek_BannerPopup_Text_3:
Also, if you conduct sleep research on Eevee
Day (November 21), you can get 1,121 bonus
sleep points.
You can get nice rewards like Eevee Incense
through special missions, which will be
available in addition to the usual missions.
And during this Eevee Week, all of your helper
Pokémon’s main skills are more likely to
be triggered!
We hope you enjoy this great work from your
helper Pokémon!

sleep score.

on your team.

of your sleep score.

individual Pokémon Natures will be applied
separately.

when you move to a new site, don’t
worry! You’ll still be able to review
